suicideauthor: Please give the helpline just one chance
suicidedescription: This bot has automatically detected a keyword related to suicide
suicidefield1: Your life is important. We all care very deeply about you. I understand you don't feel like you matter right know, but I can tell you with 100% confidence that you do. I know you might be reluctant, but please just give the suicide prevention hotline just one more chance.
suicidefield8: Come talk to real people to help you through this Discord! [Click here.](https://discord.gg/sdY4jyY)
suicidefooter: I care about you. Please try to give the helplines just one chance. I know you can make it through this. Report a bug: https://discord.gg/YHvfUqVgWS. Website: https://spbot.ml/. Type sp!mute to have the bot ignore your messages.
insultdescription: This is not a laughing matter
dmembedtitle: A user has asked us to reach out to you
dmembedauthor: Please give the helpline just one chance
dmembeddescription: Somebody has asked us to reach out personally to you in your DMs. Please listen.
dmembedfield1: Your life is important. We all care very deeply about you. I understand you don't feel like you matter right know, but I can tell you with 100% confidence that you do. I know you might be reluctant, but please just give the suicide prevention hotline just one more chance.
dmembedfield8: Come talk to real people to help you through this Discord! [Click here.](https://discord.gg/sdY4jyY)
dmembedfooter: I care about you. Please try to give the helplines just one chance. I know you can make it through this. Report a bug: https://discord.gg/YHvfUqVgWS. Website: https://spbot.ml/. Type sp!mute to have the bot ignore your messages.
infodescription: Hi! I’m a helpful bot dedicated to helping those who are at risk of suicide. I watch for key words and phrases, and then act accordingly to direct users to help. I respond with both phone and text lines specific to their country, so they can receive the best help possible. I’m 100% OPEN SOURCE and ANONYMOUS.
infofield1: I look for key words related to suicide, as well as commands like sp!help, sp!invite, and sp!ping.
infofield2heading: How do I add you to my server?
infofield2: Go to https://spbot.ml/ and click on Invite Bot.
infofield3: Yes. I am, and have always been, 100% anonmyous. I'm open source as well.
infofield4heading: I have a bug report or feature request.
infofooter: Created by @Bobrobot1#1408 | https://spbot.ml | sp!ignore to have the bot ignore your messages
helpcommands:
help
 bot (alias: neofetch, v)
 info
 invite
 mute
 ping
 dm (user)
 dmmute
 set
 lang
helpfield3heading: Need more help? Found a bug?
invitedescription: This Discord bot is an easy-to-use and easy-to-install bot for Discord, that actively prevents suicide and other crisis from occuring. Add it to your Discord server in just 3 clicks.
langstitle: Here are all the supported languages
langsfield1heading: Want more languages? Found a bug?
bot2: Does not update after you send the command. Send again to see updated info.', 'https://spbot.ml/siround.png
addtoserver: How do I add you to my server? Go to https://spbot.ml/ and click on ADD BOT.
nolang: That language is not supported. To see all languages use the command sp!lang
mute3: I will now ignore keywords you say in chat.
dmmute3: I will stop allowing others to send DMs to you via this bot. type sp!dmmute again to undo.
dmmute4: Unable to send DM. Error: Permission Denied
dmmute5: Mentioned user has opted out of user-directed bot DMs.
mention1: You need to mention a user.
seterror: You must be an administrator of this server to change the language!
